nodes.text: Avidich was a planet located in the Avidich system in the Unknown Regions within the core territory of the Chiss Ascendancy. It was located on the Vagaari Corridor, a hyperlane that ran through the Unknown Regions. Avidich was a mountainous world with peaks that were considered impressive. The planet was used by the Chiss species to cultivate edible lichens.
Avidich was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the planet in grid coordinates E-8.
